body: People seemed to not like book 23 because of the almost-NTR thing. Anyway, I'm amused at Yuuichi saying the name of the series at the end of this book "Because, I'll always be 'Together with Akiko-san'". Also, Akiko in the end asks him to "not disappear" again, which confirms that Yuuichi has been traveling through time via weird ero-doujinshi fuckery.
No 23 never has been translated.  Probably will see this one done before I hate to say.
Was part 23 ever translated to english? I love the waifus this artist make, they are my type.
can't get enough of Akiko-san wearing school uniform
